## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Strickland, Charles Lee
**판결일**: 2015-12-16
**법원**: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX


## 판결문 요약

             IN THE COURT OF CRIMINAL APPEALS
                         OF TEXAS
                           NOS. WR-26,945-03 AND WR-26,945-05


                     EX PARTE CHARLES LEE STRICKLAND, Applicant


            ON APPLICATIONS FOR WRITS OF HABEAS CORPUS
    CAUSE NOS. 89-CR-00001284-A IN THE 107TH DISTRICT COURT AND 90-CR-
                 00000202-B IN THE 138TH DISTRICT COURT
                         FROM CAMERON COUNTY


       Per curiam.

                                            ORDER

       Pursuant to the provisions of Article 11.07 of the Texas Code of Criminal Procedure, the

clerk of the trial court transmitted to this Court these applications for writs of habeas corpus. Ex

parte Young, 418 S.W.2d 824, 826 (Tex. Crim. App. 1967). Applicant was charged in the -03 case

with burglary of a habitation with two prior felony convictions, and in the -05 case with aggravated

robbery with two prior felony convictions. Applicant pleaded guilty in the -03 case to burglary of

a habitation in exchange for a twenty-five year sentence, and pleaded guilty in the -05 case to the

lesser included offense of robbery in exchange for a thirty-five year sentence. He did not appeal

these convictions.
                                                                                                       2

        Applicant contends, among other things, that his plea agreement in the -03 case was

breached, because a term of the plea agreement was that his sentence in tha...
